constraints.name: subsequence_constraint
constraints.description: 子序列内的最小值大于子序列中的所有元素
constraints.formal: ∀ l, r (l < r), min(A[l:r]) > A[i] for all i in (l, r)

constraints.name: geometric_area_constraint
constraints.description: 池塘面积计算基于两端的最小值，并考虑中间元素对面积的影响
constraints.formal: Area = (R - L + 1) * min(A[L], A[R]) - sum(max(0, A[i] - min(A[L], A[R]))) for i in (L, R)

result.description: 求满足条件的子数组的最大面积

invariants.name: monotonicity
invariants.description: 双指针左右端点单调前进，区间合法性可单调维护

invariants.name: interval_additivity
invariants.description: 区间和可通过端点差值计算，适用于前缀和优化

invariants.name: optimal_substructure
invariants.description: 最优解包含子问题的最优解，适用于动态规划求解最大池面积
